segments.text: My attention is drawn to the two children on the left.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are engaged in a rather elaborate operation to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balanced precariously on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see its legs are splayed out, making it very unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching deep into the cookie jar, one hand holding a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands nearby, her arm raised expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly waiting for her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s amazing how focused they are on their mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink remains oblivious to their scheme.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just polishing her plate, utterly unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope that stool doesn't give way; he could really get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is wet too, adding another layer of risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Children can be so determined when cookies are involved.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their secret operation is almost commendable in its execution.
segments.speaker: PAR
